scripts.build: echo '[@test/utils] Building utils...' && sleep 0.3 && echo '[@test/utils] Build done'
scripts.test: echo '[@test/utils] Testing utils...' && sleep 0.3 && echo '[@test/utils] Tests passed'
scripts.ci: echo '[@test/utils] CI: build+test...' && sleep 0.4 && echo '[@test/utils] CI passed'
scripts.deploy:prod: echo '[@test/utils] Deploying to prod...' && sleep 0.5 && echo '[@test/utils] Deployed'
